about.AboutLong: I am a Front End Developer with a background in e-commerce. I am passionate about creating user-friendly and visually appealing websites that help businesses grow. I am a proactive and creative problem-solver who enjoys working in a team and learning new technologies. I am looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow as a developer and contribute to innovative projects.
